string.text:
The PSG1 (Prazisionsschutzengewehr) is a semi-automatic sniper rifle designed and produced by the German company Heckler and Koch. It was developed as a high-accuracy, large-magazine capacity, semi-automatic rifle for law enforcement and military use. This model comes with picatinny rails for mounting various optics and devices.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] PEQ LA5 LAM
